“I know, tell them I’m on my way!” you called out, still staring at the empty screen.

No time to worry about broken computers, you gathered up the files and slid them into your briefcase. I’ll get IT to look at it after the meeting.

You made for the meeting room, the high heels you were wearing clacked loudly even on the carpeted surface. The sound made you feel confident and in charge, and also intimidated the guys, which was precisely what you wanted. Men would always look down on you unless you gave them a reason to be afraid. You knocked on the door of the meeting room and went inside, greeting your client with a firm handshake as the two of you sat down.

“May I say, you look absolutely stunning, Ms Maccinnon,” he complimented as he perused his own briefcase for documents. You sighed inwardly. These offhanded remarks were really unwelcome, especially in the workplace.
1322111.title: Time passes almost instantly, and it's time...

13221111.content:
“Why, thank you. It’s nice to get a compliment,” your aunt replied. You stifled a chuckle at her momentary look of confusion. She had never appreciated unprofessional antics in the office, and now you were making her do the exact opposite. You had planted the idea that the meeting room was completely empty except for the two of them, even though you were sitting on the other side of the table, watching everything unfold. You let the meeting play out for a few minutes, before finally getting bored with all the business-y talk.

Let’s spice things up, you decided, noticing your aunt’s client had more than a few times stolen glances at her breasts when he thought she wasn’t looking.

Is he staring at my boobs? you made your aunt think. Her brow furrowed as she took in the new thought, then she narrowed her eyes at him, her suspicions growing. She coughed once, seeing him jump slightly in his seat.

“That’s enough,” she snapped. “Eyes up here. Or do I need to tell your employers about your work ethics?”

“T-that won’t be necessary,” he stammered, visibly shaken. “I apologise for my misdemeanour, Ms Maccinnon. I didn’t mean to offend.”

“Well, the next time you want to stare, just say so,” she continued. You had to cover your mouth to prevent another laugh escaping as your aunt replied in that manner. Her gasp of shock as well as the mortified expression was hilarious, not to mention the other guy’s stunned silence.

“O-oh… well,” he coughed in embarrassment. “I’d… certainly keep that in mind… if…”

Let’s go, you grinned. Focusing on your aunt, you decided to play puppet master from here on out. She’d be completely aware of her actions but be unable to stop them. You realised she was about to end the meeting then and there, but managed to interfere with her thoughts fast enough.

“If?” you had her reply. “I know you’ve been staring at them the whole time, mister. There’s no ‘ifs’ about that. You wanted a look, so say it.”

“O-okay…” he was completely taken aback by this turn of events, and sat, dumbfounded, for a few seconds. Soon enough, he recovered enough to take advantage of the situation. With a little prodding from yourself, of course.

“May I see your boobs?” he swallowed nervously, looking around as if he was looking for a hidden camera. Your aunt’s hands reached up to her shirt, unbuttoning it slowly as she exposed more and more of herself. She shrugged out of the shirt and draped it over her chair, placing her hands over her hips, as if striking a pose.

“Well?” she asked. “Now that you’ve seen it, what do you think?”

Inside her head, however, Mary Maccinnon was screaming at herself to stop. She had just stripped out of her clothes in front of a client, who was only too excited that this was really happening. She couldn’t control her limbs, even though she was trying desperately to reach for her shirt, or turn around, or run out of the room. Anything that could let her cover herself, really.

“They’re amazing,” he coughed. “If you don’t mind me saying…”

“No I don’t,” ‘Mary’ replied, her hands reaching up to give them a squeeze. “They really are, aren’t they? Men like you can’t keep your eyes off them.” Your aunt leaned back in her chair and crossed her legs.

“So, go ahead with your proposition,” she said. “If you can manage to not stare more than ten times, I’ll sign that agreement.”

The next 30 minutes were hell for both parties, as you sat back and enjoyed their awkward situation. With your aunt’s body completely under your control, you could have it act however you wanted, most commonly positioning it in provocative stances to break his composure as he struggled not to ogle. Your aunt, on the other hand, was fighting to regain control, but you had her effectively sealed inside her own head, and she could do nothing but watch as her body moved as you commanded. You were also enjoying the show, having your usually strict aunt act like a slut.

“Impressive,” you had your aunt comment when the presentation ended. “That’s probably the first time I’ve seen someone try to give a presentation with a raging boner.”

“It was… distracting…” he admitted, wiping his brow. “I’m sorry, Ms Maccinnon, if this was your way of getting back at me for staring earlier. I promise not to do it again.”

“Nonsense,” she scoffed, getting up from her chair and sauntering over to him. She grabbed hold of his head and placed it between her breasts.

“You did an admirable job,” she stroked his head. “Now, it’s only fair that I reward you for a job well done. I’ll let you play with my boobs, how does that sound?”

No! That sounds horrible! Mary yelled at herself. For the last half an hour she was forced into so many demeaning positions as her body moved without her consent. And for some voyeuristic reason, she found that her body was getting turned on by exposing herself in front of the guy. Her loins were burning with need, and she had no doubt that if she stuck a hand down her panties, she would find it soaked. And now it seemed like her body wanted even more.

info.description:
Paranormal Powers
In this story you are, Johnathan Maccinon an 18 year old boy who lives in Providence Rhode Island with his family. One day you are cleaning in your back yard when you discover a strange statue that ends up granting you paranormal powers!
List of powers
.Possession: You can possess the body of another person. When in possession of their body you have full control over them and can make them do anything. You achieve this by phasing into their bodies in either a physical or spirit form. After you leave them you can do one of three things.
1. Make them forget what happened and they just have a blank spot in their memory
2. Alter their memories
3. Let them remember you were inside of them
.Mind control: By simply willing someone to do something they will do it. You can either make them do it and make it seem like they did it themselves or make them do something that they have no control over.
.Share Powers: Johnathan can allow his powers to be shared, but he cannot be affected by someone else using his powers against him and he can take the powers away with a thought.
Characters:
